channel.title: Help, 2 Things
channel.description:
[code]Your server is now online. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:170)[/code]
i get this error as a result of adding item stats below: (is anything wrong about them that would mess the server up??)
[code]item = 18395 Primal_Kiteshield Primal_Kiteshield 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -8 -2 70 123 102 -1 105 50 10 item = 18393 Primal_Platebody Primal_Platebody 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -30 -10 247 230 135 -6 251 50 10 item = 18391 Primal_Sword Primal_Sword 1000 1000 1000 40 324 360 -8 0 30 30 30 4 0 50 10 item = 18389 Primal_Full_Helm Primal_Helmet 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -12 -4 134 150 82 -2 138 50 10 item = 18387 Primal_Platelegs Primal_Platelegs 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -21 -7 182 158 87 -4 181 50 10 item = 18385 Primal_Plateskirt Primal_Plateskirt 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -21 -7 182 158 87 -4 181 50 10 item = 18383 Primal_Boots Primal_Boots 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -3 -1 21 23 18 -1 18 15 10 item = 13831 Primal_Gauntlets Primal_Gauntlets 1000 1000 1000 30 30 30 -1 -1 12 21 17 -1 11 15 10[/code]

item.title: Help, 2 Things
item.dc:creator: @iamminesmith iamminesmith
item.description:
@iamminesmith wrote:

i redid it making sure it was tabs

UPDATE: everythings fixed one still had just a spcae not a tab

Read full topic

item.title: Help, 2 Things
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Make sure they are formatted with tabs, not spaces.

Read full topic
